duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide outstanding customer service and troubleshoot Health Monitor screens, WIFI connectivity, and SD Card Swaps.
Communicate effectively with office managers at doctor's practices and internal teams at Health Monitor.
Increase value-add by identifying opportunities for additional offices and exam rooms that can use Health Monitor screens and services.
Gather referrals and physician/office manager testimonials and references.
Work with regional ambassador manager to provide 100% customer satisfaction to clients.
Daily travel within the assigned territory.
